<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mindblank Mutagen](/Feats.aspx?ID=124) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=7" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 81 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

With a minor adjustment of ratios in the formula for your [serene mutagen](/Equipment.aspx?ID=100), you gain mental protections. When you’re affected by a serene mutagen, [detection](/Traits.aspx?ID=43), [revelation](/Traits.aspx?ID=138), and [scrying](/Traits.aspx?ID=141) effects of 9th level or lower detect nothing from you or your possessions and auras. For instance, [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=66) would still detect other magic in the area, but not any magic on you.
name: Mindblank Mutagen
